moisturizer.productname: Rose Radiance Peptide Day Cream For Mature Skin
moisturizer.description: A pink tinted, 2-in-1 anti-aging + radiance-boosting day cream for mature skin that replenishes, visibly lifts, and smoothes wrinkles while providing a healthy, rosy glow.

benefits.1: Boosts skins radiance with a rosy glow
benefits.2: Reduces the look of deep wrinkles + skin slackening
benefits.6: Clarins plant-based Anti-Pollution Complex helps protect skin from indoor and outdoor pollution, including blue light from electronics

moisturizer.application methods: Apply to clean face and neck every morning.
